gcci.text: H100 supply stabilizes as US-East availability improves, easing capex pressures for AI clusters.

gtpi.text: Token input prices have fallen to $1.30 per million due to intensified API price wars and model efficiency gains.

gagl.text: Annual AI load of 150 TWh is pushing grid strain, prompting accelerated nuclear baseload adoption to curb carbon emissions.

aipi.text: The current consolidation wave suggests the AI sector is maturing, but lingering bubble risks demand disciplined growth strategies.
